mods.abstract: Two women arguing, both of whom wear slacks and loose blouses. The one that faces the viewer has short hair that sticks straight out from her head in all directions. The other character has her back to the viewer and chastises the other. They both have large hands with long painted fingernails.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art

titleInfo.title: Caroline Wogan Durieux Works of Art
